# The `X86InterleavedAccess.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the interleaved accesses optimization generating X86-specific instructions/intrinsics for interleaved access groups. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> implementation of the interleaved accesses optimization generating X86-specific instructions/intrinsics for interleaved access groups.

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class holds necessary information to represent an interleaved</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In order to form an interleaved access group X86InterleavedAccessGroup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// requires a wide-load instruction \\p &#39;I&#39;, a group of interleaved-vectors</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Shuffs, reference to the first indices of each interleaved-vector</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p &#39;Ind&#39; and the interleaving stride factor \\p F. In order to generate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// X86-specific instructions/intrinsics it also requires the underlying</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// target information \\p STarget.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae9baadcb34d80f6467fcd01c3f513b60"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae9baadcb34d80f6467fcd01c3f513b60">X86InterleavedAccessGroup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;ShuffleVectorInst &#42;&gt;</a> Shuffs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Ind, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp;STarget,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Inst(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), Shuffles(Shuffs), Indices(Ind), Factor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>), Subtarget(STarget),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">        DL(Inst-&gt;getDataLayout()), Builder(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if this interleaved access group can be lowered into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// x86-specific instructions/intrinsics, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isSupported() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Lowers this interleaved access group into X86-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions/intrinsics.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lowerIntoOptimizedSequence();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end anonymous namespace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae769158e04d7d2df19b436d90e02bb85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86interleavedaccess-cpp-/x86interleavedaccessgroup/#ae769158e04d7d2df19b436d90e02bb85">X86InterleavedAccessGroup::isSupported</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;ShuffleVecTy = Shuffles&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ShuffleEltTy = ShuffleVecTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#afdce715c901d62e2c1367a0ff5248175">getElementType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShuffleElemSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(ShuffleEltTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WideInstSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, lowering is supported for the following vectors:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stride 4:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    1 Store and load of 4-element vectors of 64 bits on AVX.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    2 Store of 16/32-element vectors of 8 bits on AVX.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stride 3:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    1 Load of 16/32-element vectors of 8 bits on AVX.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Subtarget.hasAVX() || (Factor != 4 &amp;&amp; Factor != 3))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    WideInstSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(Inst-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Inst)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a21b1f2d0effa0506f01cb146823de6a2">getPointerAddressSpace</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    WideInstSize = DL.getTypeSizeInBits(Shuffles&#91;0&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/tapifile-cpp/#a913a691648e20063bbd278e8f02d8430">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We support shuffle represents stride 4 for byte type with size of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WideInstSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShuffleElemSize == 64 &amp;&amp; WideInstSize == 1024 &amp;&amp; Factor == 4)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShuffleElemSize == 8 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(Inst) &amp;&amp; Factor == 4 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">      (WideInstSize == 256 || WideInstSize == 512 || WideInstSize == 1024 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">       WideInstSize == 2048))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShuffleElemSize == 8 &amp;&amp; Factor == 3 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      (WideInstSize == 384 || WideInstSize == 768 || WideInstSize == 1536))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SVI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ShuffleVectorInst&gt;</a>(VecInst)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op0 = SVI-&gt;getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// genShuffleBland - Creates shuffle according to two vectors.This function is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only works on instructions with lane inside 256 registers. According to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the mask &#39;Mask&#39; creates a new Mask &#39;Out&#39; by the offset of the mask. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset amount depends on the two integer, &#39;LowOffset&#39; and &#39;HighOffset&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Where the &#39;LowOffset&#39; refers to the first vector and the highOffset refers to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the second vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |a0....a5,b0....b4,c0....c4|a16..a21,b16..b20,c16..c20|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |c5...c10,a5....a9,b5....b9|c21..c26,a22..a26,b21..b25|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |b10..b15,c11..c15,a10..a15|b26..b31,c27..c31,a27..a31|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the sequence to work as a mirror to the load.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We must consider the elements order as above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In this function we are combining two types of shuffles.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The first one is vpshufed and the second is a type of &quot;blend&quot; shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By computing the shuffle on a sequence of 16 elements(one lane) and add the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// correct offset. We are creating a vpsuffed + blend sequence between two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shuffles.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="#a49570d8463bc060cddd7b65335685002"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a49570d8463bc060cddd7b65335685002">genShuffleBland</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> Mask,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Out, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LowOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HighOffset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>() &gt;= 256 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;This function doesn&#39;t accept width smaller then 256&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumOfElm = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Mask)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + LowOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Mask)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">    Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + HighOffset + NumOfElm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reorderSubVector returns the data to is the original state. And de-facto is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the opposite of  the function concatSubVector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|      TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|  =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |1|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|      TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |2|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|3|      TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|4|  =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |2|3|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|5|      TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |4|5|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; -  |0|3|6|9 |     TransposedMatrix&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|2 |3 |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; -  |1|4|7|10| =&gt;  TransposedMatrix&#91;1&#93; - |4|5|6 |7 |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; -  |2|5|8|11|     TransposedMatrix&#91;2&#93; - |8|9|10|11|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284" lineLink="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa">reorderSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;TransposedMatrix,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Vec, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> VPShuf,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecElems, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Stride,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VecElems == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; Stride; i++)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">      TransposedMatrix&#91;i&#93; = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(Vec&#91;i&#93;, VPShuf);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#aeaf0abeac6c9f6e4698dd90c080611fa">reorderSubVector</a>(VT, TransposedMatrix, VecOut, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="#a76c9562101f54d25482f88ae29ed6131">Concat</a>, 16), NumOfElm,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  createShuffleStride returns shuffle mask of size N.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  The shuffle pattern is as following :</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &#123;0, Stride%(VF/Lane), (2&#42;Stride%(VF/Lane))...(VF&#42;Stride/Lane)%(VF/Lane),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  (VF/ Lane) ,(VF / Lane)+Stride%(VF/Lane),...,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  (VF / Lane)+(VF&#42;Stride/Lane)%(VF/Lane)&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Where Lane is the # of lanes in a register:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  VectorSize = 128 =&gt; Lane = 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  VectorSize = 256 =&gt; Lane = 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  For example shuffle pattern for VF 16 register size 256 -&gt; lanes = 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &#123;&lt;&#91;0|3|6|1|4|7|2|5&#93;-&#91;8|11|14|9|12|15|10|13&#93;&gt;&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433" lineLink="#abf385bdb1a42f2648e94d92fbe51a9df"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#abf385bdb1a42f2648e94d92fbe51a9df">createShuffleStride</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Stride,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Mask) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LaneCount = std::max(VectorSize / 128, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lane = 0; Lane &lt; LaneCount; Lane++)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, LaneSize = VF / LaneCount; i != LaneSize; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">      Mask.push&#95;back((i &#42; Stride) % LaneSize + LaneSize &#42; Lane);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  setGroupSize sets &#39;SizeInfo&#39; to the size(number of elements) of group</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  inside mask a shuffleMask. A mask contains exactly 3 groups, where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  each group is a monotonically increasing sequence with stride 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  For example shuffleMask &#123;0,3,6,1,4,7,2,5&#125; =&gt; &#123;3,3,2&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447" lineLink="#adcbb3fbae2a0dfe66454040a45525a95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#adcbb3fbae2a0dfe66454040a45525a95">setGroupSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;SizeInfo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorSize = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>() / std::max(VectorSize / 128, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, FirstGroupElement = 0; i &lt; 3; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GroupSize = std::ceil((VF - FirstGroupElement) / 3.0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">    SizeInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(GroupSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">    FirstGroupElement = ((GroupSize)&#42;3 + FirstGroupElement) % VF;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  DecodePALIGNRMask returns the shuffle mask of vpalign instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  vpalign works according to lanes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Where Lane is the # of lanes in a register:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  VectorWide = 128 =&gt; Lane = 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  VectorWide = 256 =&gt; Lane = 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  For Lane = 1 shuffle pattern is: &#123;DiffToJump,...,DiffToJump+VF-1&#125;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  For Lane = 2 shuffle pattern is:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &#123;DiffToJump,...,VF/2-1,VF,...,DiffToJump+VF-1&#125;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Imm variable sets the offset amount. The result of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  function is stored inside ShuffleMask vector and it built as described in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  the begin of the description. AlignDirection is a boolean that indicates the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  direction of the alignment. (false - align to the &quot;right&quot; side while true -</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  align to the &quot;left&quot; side)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470" lineLink="#a0283fbbacd7e1b520ab58b9b867b1c71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab489acbbe8913e85a72c328360e7b80b">DecodePALIGNRMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Imm,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumLanes = std::max((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>() / 128, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  Imm = AlignDirection ? Imm : (NumLaneElts - Imm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = Imm &#42; (VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a2e101ce5736aa0643639fd3adae18088">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() / 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> l = 0; l != NumElts; l += NumLaneElts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != NumLaneElts; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = i + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if i+offset is out of this lane then we actually need the other source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Unary the other source is the first source.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> &gt;= NumLaneElts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> = Unary ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> % NumLaneElts : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> + NumElts - NumLaneElts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShuffleMask.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a> + l);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// concatSubVector - The function rebuilds the data to a correct expected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order. An assumption(The shape of the matrix) was taken for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deinterleaved to work with lane&#39;s instructions like &#39;vpalign&#39; or &#39;vphuf&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function ensures that the data is built in correct way for the lane</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions. Each lane inside the vector is a 128-bit length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The &#39;InVec&#39; argument contains the data in increasing order. In InVec&#91;0&#93; You</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can find the first 128 bit data. The number of different lanes inside a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector depends on the &#39;VecElems&#39;.In general, the formula is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VecElems &#42; type / 128 The size of the array &#39;InVec&#39; depends and equal to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;VecElems&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |1|  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |2|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|3|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |2|3|  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|4|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |4|5|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|5|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VecElems = 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;0&#93; - |0|1|2 |3 |      Vec&#91;0&#93; - |0|3|6|9 |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;1&#93; - |4|5|6 |7 |  =&gt;  Vec&#91;1&#93; - |1|4|7|10|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invec&#91;2&#93; - |8|9|10|11|      Vec&#91;2&#93; - |2|5|8|11|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519" lineLink="#ad6fab051afe7926d360bac2cd1e82819"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ad6fab051afe7926d360bac2cd1e82819">concatSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&#42;Vec, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> InVec,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VecElems, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VecElems == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; 3; i++)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">      Vec&#91;i&#93; = InVec&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// group2Shuffle reorder the shuffle stride back into continuous order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example For VF16 with Mask1 = &#123;0,3,6,9,12,15,2,5,8,11,14,1,4,7,10,13&#125; =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaskResult = &#123;0,11,6,1,12,7,2,13,8,3,14,9,4,15,10,5&#125;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603" lineLink="#ab6c5507fc91d0ca19adbac9927262086"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ab6c5507fc91d0ca19adbac9927262086">group2Shuffle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Mask,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;int&gt;</a> &amp;Output) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IndexGroup&#91;3&#93; = &#123;0, 0, 0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VectorWidth = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a7be7c6dd92efc0d6f866d4a3b433eed0">getSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VF = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a3a371e99982e3168caf644d82298fcac">getVectorNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the index of the different groups.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lane = (VectorWidth / 128 &gt; 0) ? VectorWidth / 128 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; 3; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexGroup&#91;(Index &#42; 3) % (VF / Lane)&#93; = Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    Index += Mask&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// According to the index compute the convert mask.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; VF / Lane; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    Output.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(IndexGroup&#91;i % 3&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexGroup&#91;i % 3&#93;++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to generate target-sized register(/instruction).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">    decompose(Inst, Factor, ShuffleTy, DecomposedVectors);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform matrix-transposition in order to compute interleaved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// results by generating some sort of (optimized) target-specific</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now replace the unoptimized-interleaved-vectors with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transposed-interleaved vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = Shuffles.size(); i &lt; e; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">      Shuffles&#91;i&#93;-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(TransposedVectors&#91;Indices&#91;i&#93;&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ShuffleEltTy = ShuffleTy-&gt;getElementType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSubVecElems = ShuffleTy-&gt;getNumElements() / Factor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lower the interleaved stores:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1 Decompose the interleaved wide shuffle into individual shuffle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vectors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">  decompose(Shuffles&#91;0&#93;, Factor,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(ShuffleEltTy, NumSubVecElems),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">            DecomposedVectors);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   2 Transpose the interleaved-vectors into vectors of contiguous</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumSubVecElems) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 4:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 16:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 32:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">                            NumSubVecElems);</Highlight></CodeLine>
